articles.title: Ukraine war: Russia blames US and vows response for Crimea deaths - BBC.com
articles.description: Russia says US-made missiles programmed by American specialists were used in an attack which killed four.
articles.content:
Russia has blamed the US and vowed "consequences" for a Ukrainian missile strike on Sevastopol in occupied Crimea on Sunday, which officials say killed four people - including two children.

articles.title: NASA Sued After Space Junk Projectile Crashes Into Florida Home - ScienceAlert
articles.description: An American family is claiming more than $80,000 from NASA after a small piece of debris fell from space and smashed through the roof of their Florida home, a law firm said Friday.
